meanings.definition: To untie or loosen the laces of (a shoe or other item of clothing).
meanings.sent1: She carefully unlaces her sneakers before entering the house.
meanings.sent2: He always unlaces his boots after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy unlaces everyone's shoes during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The magician unlaces the shoe, revealing a hidden card inside.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, she unlaces the corset, feeling instant relief.

meanings.definition: To remove the laces from (a shoe or other item of clothing).
meanings.sent1: He unlaces the old sneakers to replace the worn-out laces.
meanings.sent2: She unlaces the dress to wash it properly.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy pirate accidentally unlaces his own boots while trying to walk.
meanings.sent4: The gardener unlaces the scarecrow's hat to adjust its position.
meanings.sent5: The tailor skillfully unlaces the jacket to make alterations.
